docs.snippet: The Steamship De Soto, Capt. J.D. BULLOCH, from New Orleans, via Havana, on the 14th, arrived here yesterday, having been detained by fog outside the bar.

docs.snippet: PRAYER FOR COLLEGES. The following arrangements were made at a meeting of pastors, held on Friday afternoon : 1. A Daily Union Prayer-meeting, from 4 to 5 o'clock P.M, commencing on Monday, the 20th inst., and continuing through the week.

docs.snippet: A traveler paused on the outskirts of a picturesque village to survey the romantic surroundings, with the eye of an artist and the heart of a poet.

headline.main: THE LOST DEEDS. AN OLD-FASHIONED LOVE STORY.; CHAPTER I. THE OLD RUIN A FEARFUL HISTORY. CHAPTER II. AN OPPORTUNITY REJECTED. CHAPTER III. ANOTHER STRANGE OUTRAGE AT THE RUIN. CHAPTER IV. THE OLD CRONE'S WARNING. CHAPTER V. AN UNACCOUNTABLE PHENOMENON.

docs.snippet: The life of EDWARD BATES presents, in its outline, a resemblance to that of CLAY, JACKSON and others, who, born at the South, on the eastern side of the Alleghanies, and possessed of no inheritance save that of indomitable energy of character,...

headline.main: PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES.; Hon. Edward Bates' of Missouri.

docs.lead_paragraph: The life of EDWARD BATES presents, in its outline, a resemblance to that of CLAY, JACKSON and others, who, born at the South, on the eastern side of the Alleghanies, and possessed of no inheritance save that of indomitable energy of character, crossed the mountains at an early age, and taking an active part in the movement of society around them rose with the rising tide to fame, if not to fortune.
